title: Legendary.Lossless.Repack-R.G.Origami
description:
Legendary.Lossless.Repack-R.G.Origami


November 17, 2008 
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 1st Person 
Language: English / Russian 
Sound Language: English / Russian 
Publication Type: Lossless RePack 
Crack: enclosing 
Platform: PC

System Requirements 
Operating System: Microsoft Windows XP / Vista / Se7eN 
Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent AMD Athlon 64 x2 with 2 GHz 
Memory: 2GB 
Video: class NVIDIA GeForce 8800GT or ATI  Radeon HD3850 and above with 512 MB Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹memory, compatible with DirectX  9.0c 
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0 
Free space on hard drive: 8Gb

Description 

Professional thief Charles Deckard, specializing in rare works of art, from a purely professional 
considerations, wade in one of the museums in New York and, as if on their own, opens the box - 
nothing other than the legendary Pandora's box.

What happens next is fully consistent ancient Greek myth: Hidden under a single lock, 
all the troubles, evils and vices at once hit the peaceful citizens, and together with 
them - and Deckard. In the skies over New York revealed a huge crater, where, as if 
from a horn of plenty, there are griffons, werewolves and other mythical monsters. 
Residents megapolis devour, peck, torn to pieces, columns, pressure and take away 
to an unknown destination.

Not ready for such serious consequences and are not sophisticated in dealing with demonic creatures, 
Charles is one - to try to close the Pandora's box. What is it for this should be done - to identify 
himself the hero.

Game Features 

An extraordinary first-person shooter, created by a team of developers Call Of Duty . 

Fully interactive, mobile gaming space, which operates freely many secondary characters and monsters, 
ready at any moment to abandon their case and thrown into the attack. 
Extremely powerful artificial intelligence of enemies. 
The graphics engine is based on the Unreal Engine 3.0, 
destroyed scenery realistic physics surrounding objects.

Features RePack 

Do not cut / no recoded 
Game Version - 1.0 
Installation time ~ 20 minutes
